post:
It's that time of year again, well almost, its the 27th somewhere right?

I will be maintaining an index of all offers that seem relevant to the community here, primarily of offers posted here however if there are offers elsewhere that I believe are good for the wider community I will also index them however I will make it clear it is an external link I will not, however, replicate any (deliberately) on the [thread ](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/2087/the-big-list-of-bf-cm-2020-offers-from-here-and-there "thread ")@vyas created

All providers are welcome to post offers in this thread, you may obviously post your own independent thread as well and I will try and capture that here as well.

Please keep in mind I am flying solo on this as well as keeping up with my own BF/CM thread so I will no doubt make a few mistakes or miss some things and during this period I may struggle to keep up with notifications and PM's but I will do my best to keep on top of it all.

When I get time, perhaps over the weekend I will also be indexing what I believe to be the top offers on the main website and linking this comments section to the forum.

Click on the ![](http://talk.lowendspirit.com/uploads/editor/3y/rcmyiy0wx121.png "") to reveal or hide the offer.

<details>
<summary> HostSlick  Exclusive Dedi-Deals for Black Friday 2020 and VPS coupons</summary>
**HostSlick.com**  has brought very attractive and powerful deals to the community this Black-Friday.    If you need a lot of power or even Storage for your project then these dedicated servers are for you.   The first deal receives 2x 3TB SAS, the second deal 2x 6TB SAS. With either Hardware RAID1 or 0.

And guess what, they will not eat your wallet.  Additionally, we provide a DirectAdmin License on top of that.   Additional IPv4 are 1,50€ per IP per month though.  However, you are welcome to bring your own Range as well. We can announce them for free on our Cisco Router.  Our AS Number is AS208046.

We are constantly and rapidly growing.   We also provide a Black Friday discount of 60% on our KVM and OpenVZ based VPS [here](https://hostslick.com/vps.php "here"). **Using Coupon:   BF2020-VPS**
Other Dedicated Servers (on-site here) receive 35% recurring. Coupon:  
**BF2020-DED**

Or are you in need of WebHosting only? Check our DirectAdmin Shared Hosting deals at 7,50€/year [here](https://hostslick.com/web-hosting.php "here"). 50% BF DISCOUNT COUPON: **BF2020-SHARED**



**Why HostSlick?**
 
- Wide range of Payment methods accepted
- Complimentary 100Gbps Corero SmartWalls DDoS Protection with any Server for occasional attacks that may happen.
- Own Hardware, Network in The Netherlands.
- Network based on industry-leading Juniper & Cisco Equipment
- Support On-Site for Emergencies 24x7
- 24x7 Monitored
- Friendly Sales/Support Staff.
- Free IP Announcements (Have an IP range? We will announce it with NO FEE on our Cisco Router and ASN!)
- Long-Term running business. We will not leave the market anytime soon (Guaranteed!)
- Deep Discounts for interested Dedicated-Server resellers.
- No hidden extra costs. No Bandwidth overcharges. Once reached, we will contact you with choices to Upgrade.
- :love: :love: We love Servers and their Noise they make! ! :love: :love:
 
 
 
**Every Dedicated Server includes**
 
- 1Gbit Uplink. 15TB Non-overbooked Traffic. More can be configured upon Order
- Permanent KVM-over-IP (HP ILO4 Advanced)
- Bandwidth Graph
- Automated Re-Installs
- Sexy Control Panel with API to control your Server (Besides ILO4)
- Complimentary Sensor-Mode Corero 100Gbps DDoS Protection for occasional attacks
- Black-Friday Dealz: FREE DirectAdmin Licenses
- Non-overbooked Network
 
_______________________________________________________
All Bare-Metal/Dedicated Servers bellow are HPE Hardware.
 
_______________________________________________________

**About OVHcloud**
OVHcloud is a global provider of hyperscale cloud, which offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector. Founded in 1999, the group manages and maintains 30 datacentres in 12 sites across four continents, deploys its own global fiber-optic network, and manages the entire supply chain for web hosting. Running on its own infrastructures, OVH provides simple, powerful tools for businesses, revolutionizing the way that more than 1 million customers work across the globe. Respect for individuals’ right to privacy and equal access to new technologies is central to the company’s values.
Learn more: https://www.ovhcloud.com/asia/about-us/who-are/
